Starlab Transformer Compression with SRP (Selectively Regularized Pruning)

Author: Hyojin Jeon (tarahjjeon@snu.ac.kr), Seoul National University
Seungcheol Park (ant6si@snu.ac.kr), Seoul National University
U Kang (ukang@snu.ac.kr), Seoul National University

Version : 1.0
Date : Nov 29, 2022
Main Contact: Hyojin Jeon

This software is free of charge under research purposes.
For commercial purposes, please contact the authors.
This code is mainly based on the [GitHub Repository]
[GitHub Repository]: https://github.com/facebookresearch/fairseq

SRP: Selectively Regularized Pruning

File: modules/layer_norm.py

  • Define custom layer normalization.

Weighted Layer Normalization

Parameters:

  • normalized_shape

  • eps (float)

  • elementwise_affine (bool)

  • device (str)

  • dtype

modules.layer_norm. layer_norm( normalized_shape, eps = 1e-5, elementwise_affine = True, export = False )

LayerNorm

Parameters:

  • normalized_shape

  • eps

  • elementwise_affine

  • export

File: modules/srp_layer.py

  • Defines the layers that make up the SRP.

modules.srp_layer. SRPEncoderLayerBase (nn.Module )

Encoder layer block.

functions:

  • __init__ – initialize encoder layer block

  • build_fc1 – Build the first layer of the feed-forward block

  • build_fc2 – Build the second layer of the feed-forward block

  • _get_fc_rank – Build self-attention layer

  • build_self_attention – Build self-attention layer.

  • residual_connection – Residual connection

  • upgrade_state_dict_named – Rename layer norm states from `...layer_norms.0.weight` to `...self_attn_layer_norm.weight` and `...layer_norms.1.weight` to `...final_layer_norm.weight`

  • forward – forward pass of encoder layer block

modules.srp_layer. DecoderLayerBase (nn.Module )

Decoder layer block.

functions:

  • __init__ – initialize encoder layer block

  • build_fc1 – Build the first layer of the feed-forward block

  • build_fc2 – Build the second layer of the feed-forward block

  • build_self_attention – Build self-attention layer.

  • build_encoder_attention – Build encoder attention layer

  • prepare_for_onnx_export_ – Prepare model for ONNX export

  • residual_connection – Residual connection

  • upgrade_state_dict_named – Rename layer norm states from `...layer_norms.0.weight` to `...self_attn_layer_norm.weight` and `...layer_norms.1.weight` to `...final_layer_norm.weight`

  • forward – forward pass of encoder layer block

  • make_generation_fast_ – Prepare model for fast decoding
